name: NaturalTreeExpansionReloaded_016
title: Natural Tree Expansion Reloaded
author: msakuta/satscape/8ZN
description: Trees spread naturally over time, they'll grow around anywhere the player visits, but only on grass and dirt areas, not concrete or any man-made tiles or sandy deserts etc. This originally was msakuta's mod! I'm simply patched it to version 0.16 of Factorio.
